title: Build docs with feature flag tags for docs.rs
body:
Follow up to https://github.com/busyboredom/acceptxmr/pull/59.

This enables those cool feature flag tags, only for https://docs.rs, e.g:

![example](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101352116/235004615-3799a27c-3df8-4fb4-845c-ac17213e2023.png)

This feature is nightly only but:
- It's only enabled for docs.rs
- docs.rs uses a nightly compiler

To show the tags locally you can use:
```
RUSTDOCFLAGS="--cfg docsrs" cargo +nightly doc --all-features
```

title: Build docs with all features for docs.rs
body:
Builds documentation with `--all-features` (only for https://docs.rs)

Closes https://github.com/busyboredom/acceptxmr/issues/51.

title: Use pedantic clippy everywhere
body: Use pedantic clippy everywhere, including examples.

title: Use webpki roots
body: Use mozilla webpki roots instead of native roots to improve portability.

body:
Implement a standalone payment gateway.

This will be a long-lived branch acting as master for the Standalone AcceptXMR project.

title: Update changelog and readme
body: Update readme and changelog in preperation for 0.12.0

title: Add integration test for default account
Use nightly formatting
body: Use nightly formatting to enable unstable formatting config.

title: Use dead hyper connector.
body:
It was unsused. Clippy missed it because there was one method call "using" it. 

By basing the rustls connector off of it instead of removing it, we can keep the connection timeout feature.

title: Seperate subscription functionality from storage layer
Abstract storage layer away
body: Remove mandatory dependency on sled, and enable library consumers to define arbitrary storage layers.
